description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a filter screen allowing users to set criteria for height, weight, race, and hair color. It manages form state, interacts with a provider for state management, and supports saving and resetting filter preferences.

classes.name: FilterScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides a UI for editing filter criteria such as height, weight, race, and hair color.

classes.name: _FilterScreenState
classes.description: The state class managing the form inputs and interactions within the FilterScreen widget.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the form state with current filter criteria from the provider when the widget is first created.

methods.name: _onSave
methods.description: Validates and saves the current form inputs to update the filter criteria via the provider.

methods.name: _validateNumber
methods.description: Helper method to validate numeric input fields, ensuring they are valid, non-negative numbers or empty.
